title: Do you know why the will has damages or marks?
question: Do you know why the will has damages or marks?
willDamageReasonDescriptionTitle: Reason for the damages or marks to the will
willDamageReasonDescriptionHint: Give as much detail as you can. This may help reduce any delays in processing your application

willDamageReasonKnown.required: Answer ‘yes’ if the will has visible damage
